name: Kids Train Racing: Race Train Engine With Friends
name_original: Kids Train Racing: Race Train Engine With Friends
description:
Kids train racing is the best train simulator that will allow you to drive train with friends and any opponents and you can defeat them in this train racing game. Driver this kids train on real rail tracks and test your ability to become a good driver. Detailed and beautiful snow and green map with different amazing trains, awesome weather and wonderful features is the beauty of this game. A wonderful jungle and Mountain View. You will feel like you are driving a train in real life. Drive the train from one rail station to next and test your skills to become a good driver and push back to your opponent.

Features:
- Realistic snow and mountain View
- Different Camera angels
- Wonderful environment
- Stop and Start the train
- Amazing countryside places
- Intuitive train controls
- Realistic hd graphics
- For kid and adults
